
```{r}
keyword = "Covid OR COVID-19 OR cornavirus OR pandemic OR covid19 OR omicron"
```


```{r}
auth_setup_default()

ny_tweets

```

```{r}
jsonData <- toJSON(ny_tweets)
if (!file.exists("ny.json")){
  write(jsonData, "ny.json")
}
```
